about.title: About Bonistock
about.missionText: To democratize analyst-grade investment research for everyday investors. We believe everyone deserves access to the same data Wall Street uses — presented simply, scored transparently, and actionable in seconds.
about.howWeWorkText: We aggregate analyst ratings and price targets from commercial data providers, compute a composite upside × conviction score, and present the results in a beginner-friendly interface. Our Auto-Mix engine converts any dollar amount into a diversified, risk-weighted portfolio you can execute with one click.
about.transparencyText: Every score, every rating, every recommendation is shown with its source data. We flag thin analyst coverage, warn about downtrend risks, and always anchor portfolios with diversified ETFs. We'd rather lose a click than your trust.
